name: Methuselah (Felltree Interactive, Cyberboy2000, BakeAsnake, Hufa, LostmyCigar, Daniel Mattsson, Emiliskog, Erik "Ehji" Ehrngren)
name_original: Methuselah (Felltree Interactive, Cyberboy2000, BakeAsnake, Hufa, LostmyCigar, Daniel Mattsson, Emiliskog, Erik "Ehji" Ehrngren)
description:
The forests of the earth are in shambles, mankind has neglected their impact on the planets ecosystems. As a final act of resilience the soul of the forest awakens in the form of a guardian by the name Methuselah. This entity has to make a stand against the humans creations.
